title: Gymnosperms
content: probably aren't what you think -- [find out more!](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020112004/http:/lasquetipress.blogspot.com/2008/06/gymnosperms-on-my-mind.html)
author: Linda Cunningham

comments.content:
they're seeds  
any fifth-grader could tell you that  
but are you smarter than a fifth grader?  
\>^p
That's pretty darned generic, Paul -- you can do better than that.... ;-)
the only thing better i can do is to tell you they're "naked seeds" from the greek. for any other info, i'd hafta use wikipedia...
Umm, and so how many fifth-graders know Greek? C'mon -- even the simplest Google search could have done better!
